00030 // changed 2004-10-15: included deterministic_behaviour variable.
00031 // If deterministic_behaviour is set to 1, the burst and silence
00032 // lengths are fix, not chosen from a distribution
00033

00035 #define _BSSRC_H_
00036 
00037 #include "in1out.h"
00038 
00039 //tolua_begin
00040 class   bssrc:  public  in1out {        
00041 typedef in1out  baseclass;
00042 
00043 public:
00044         bssrc();
00045         ~bssrc();       
00046 
00047         void    SetDeterministicEx(int det); // included 2004-10-29
00048         void    SetDeterministicEs(int det); // included 2004-10-29
00049 
00050         int act(void);
00051 
00052         double          ex;             
00053         double          es;     
00054         int             delta;
00055         int             dist_burst;
00056         int             dist_silence;
00057         int             state;                  /* current state:
00058                                                 * is decremented with each sent cell. If
00059                                                 * state = 0, the current burst is finished
00060                                                 */
00061         int deterministic_ex;   // included 2004-10-15
00062         int deterministic_es;   // included 2004-10-15
00063 //tolua_end
